title: Drawing, "Steeple in baroque style"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
inscribed: Inscribed in brown ink at center right: Campanile ser lo/stile di Boromini/seg to quando ero/arrobbito p[er] non aver/denari solito di chi/fatica a di/chi non a/cogno; at upper right: 47
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Steeple in baroque style".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1245.
